b: when told incorrect then is fail = 1, become untweened next in 0.1s
when told correct then is fail = 0, become untweened next in 0.1s
when starts then is loopval = 0, become untweened next
when starts and is loopval < 6 then become untweened next
when starts and is loopval >= 6 then become untweened 6
when starts and is area.stargatefastdial == 0 then tell any g-sg-pass, become untweened next in 3s
when starts and is area.stargatefastdial == 1 then tell any g-sg-pass, become untweened next in 0.2s
when starts then is loopval += 1, become untweened 3
when starts and is fail == 1 then tell any g-sg-fail, become 1 in 3s
when starts and is fail == 0 then tell any g-sg-pass, become 1 in 3s
when told by any stargatedial then tell correct
when told by any g-sg-reset then tell any stargatereset
when starts then is multiplier = 0.1
when is code < 10000 then is rcode = code
when is code >= 10000 then is lcodefu = code - rcode
when is lcodefu > 0 then is lcode = lcodefu / 10000
when told by any g-sg-reset then is multiplier = 0.1, is code = 0, is rcode = 0, is lcode = 0
when touches hand and is multiplier == 10000000 then become next in 0.6s, tell codesend, play soft woosh
when touches hand and is multiplier < 10000000 then play death sound 8 bit
when told by any g-sg-reset then become 1 in 0.6s
when touches hand then tell any g-sg-end, play switch off
when touches hand and is multiplier < 10000000 then become next in 0.5s, play soft woosh, is multiplier *= 10, is code += 1 * multiplier
when told by any g-sg-reset then become 1 in 0.1s
when touches hand and is multiplier < 10000000 then become next in 0.5s, play soft woosh, is multiplier *= 10, is code += 9 * multiplier
when told by any g-sg-reset then become 1 in 0.1s
when touches hand and is multiplier < 10000000 then become next in 0.5s, play soft woosh, is multiplier *= 10, is code += 7 * multiplier
when told by any g-sg-reset then become 1 in 0.1s
when touches hand and is multiplier < 10000000 then become next in 0.5s, play soft woosh, is multiplier *= 10, is code += 2 * multiplier
when told by any g-sg-reset then become 1 in 0.1s
when touches hand and is multiplier < 10000000 then become next in 0.5s, play soft woosh, is multiplier *= 10, is code += 3 * multiplier
when told by any g-sg-reset then become 1 in 0.1s
when touches hand and is multiplier < 10000000 then become next in 0.5s, play soft woosh, is multiplier *= 10, is code += 4 * multiplier
when told by any g-sg-reset then become 1 in 0.1s
when touches hand and is multiplier < 10000000 then become next in 0.5s, play soft woosh, is multiplier *= 10, is code += 5 * multiplier
when told by any g-sg-reset then become 1 in 0.1s
when touches hand and is multiplier < 10000000 then become next in 0.5s, play soft woosh, is multiplier *= 10, is code += 6 * multiplier
when told by any g-sg-reset then become 1 in 0.1s
when touches hand and is multiplier < 10000000 then become next in 0.5s, play soft woosh, is multiplier *= 10, is code += 8 * multiplier
when told by any g-sg-reset then become 1 in 0.1s
when touches hand then tell any g-sg-reset
when told codesend then is area.stargatefastdial = 0, tell any g-sg-fastdialreq
when told codesend then become untweened next
when starts then is area.stargatecode = code, become untweened 3 in 0.5s
when starts then tell incorrect, become untweened 1
